document_data.name: Osconivon
document_data.mainbody: '''Osconivon''' was the Lord Magistrate of [[Zhentil Keep]]'s [[Council of Lords (Zhentil Keep)|Council of Lords]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Osconivon was a drunken fool in service of [[Manshoon]]; deep he was a coward but not stupid. Osconivon thought that Manshoon could protect him better than anyone else; however if he saw no risk he accepted to silent things to Manshoon or followed interests of other people for the right price. He did not believe in stupid things like pride, honor or trust
document_data.Possessions: Being a magistrate, Osconivon was known to carry around and use a [[gavel]]. When threatened, he would wield his gavel as though it were a [[club]].<ref name=RoZK-p58>
document_data.History:
Osconivon was the son of a rich [[Zhent]] merchant; Manshoon appointed him as Lord Magistrate knowing how easy it would be to control him. He accepted brides from everyone, trying to not impact Manshoon's interests .

His estate was located in the eastern section of Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] at the intersection of [[Gold Street]] and [[the Dark Road]].
